name: OR_LNLG_PSTOP_CLOSURE
description: This table contains documentation regarding incision closure material.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INCISION_CLOSURE_MATERIAL_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document the incision closure material used during case completion.
